name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move Card Easily for GitHub Projects

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to move a card easily in GitHub Projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to move a card easily in GitHub Projects.

If the destination column is far away, it cannot be reached in a single drag and drop. Especially when the monitor is small, such as in a laptop environment. Using this extension, the column shrinks to reach the desired column.
